## PUBLICATION

•	All accepted, paid, and presented papers from iCMS2025 will be considered for publication in one of the following journals, matching their respective scopes.

Publication Opportunities:

WoS/SCOPUS\

- Romanian Statistical Review (WoS) [https://www.revistadestatistica.ro/](https://www.revistadestatistica.ro/)\
- Austrian Journal of Statistics (SCOPUS/WoS) [https://www.ajs.or.at/index.php/ajs/index](https://www.ajs.or.at/index.php/ajs/index)\
- Educational Media International (EMI) (SCOPUS)[https://www.tandfonline.com/journals/remi20](https://www.tandfonline.com/journals/remi20)\
- Journal of Information and Communication Technology (JICT) (WoS/SCOPUS) - RM 1000 [https://e-journal.uum.edu.my/index.php/jict](https://e-journal.uum.edu.my/index.php/jict)\
- MATEMATIKA: Malaysian Journal of Industrial and Applied Mathematics (WoS) - RM 300 [https://matematika.utm.my/index.php/matematika](https://matematika.utm.my/index.php/matematika)\


MyCITE\

- Journal of Applied Mathematics and Computational Intelligence (AMCI)* [https://ejournal.unimap.edu.my/index.php/amci](https://ejournal.unimap.edu.my/index.php/amci)\
- Journal of Creative Practices in Language Learning and Teaching (CPLT)* [https://cplt.uitm.edu.my/v1/](https://cplt.uitm.edu.my/v1/)\
- Voice of Academia (VoA)* [https://voa.uitm.edu.my/v1/](https://voa.uitm.edu.my/v1/)\
- International Journal of Innovation and Industrial Revolution (IJIREV)- RM 200 [https://ijirev.com/](https://ijirev.com/)\
- International Journal of Education,Psychology and Counseling (IJEPC) - RM 200 [https://www.ijepc.com/](https://www.ijepc.com/)\

SINTA\

- IndoMath: Indonesia Mathematics Education (Sinta 3) - 75.00 (USD) [https://indomath.org/index.php/indomath](https://indomath.org/index.php/indomath)\
- JStatistika PGRI Adi Buana Surabaya (Sinta 4) – Submission fee (no); Approved for Publication (approximately RM 140-RM 150) [https://jurnal.unipasby.ac.id/index.php/jstatistika/](https://jurnal.unipasby.ac.id/index.php/jstatistika/)\

• All journals are recognized in SCOPUS/MYCITE. The final publication is subject to a rigorous quality assessment by the editorial team of the publisher.

• Papers that do not meet the criteria for the SCOPUS-indexed journal will be forwarded to the MYCITE journal for further consideration. Papers will be published in WoS/Scopus/MyCITE journals with an additional cost paid to the journal publisher.

• The selection of the journal is at the discretion of the journal publisher and not the iCSM2025 organizer.

• Author will need to follow the template provided by the selected journal.\
